comments.author: das Keks.5403
comments.body:
Hey

Do characters have a GUID like the account does? And if yes can we get access to it via the API?

I’m saving characters in a database and give them an own new and short integer id.

To get the right id from my table I have to compare the account, character name and character created date. Without the date it could be another character if I deleted the old and created a new with the same name. A GUID would make that a lot easier.

Sincerely,
das Keks
